detail_desc: Round-necked T-shirt in airy linen jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft linen jersey with a V-neck and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication, and diagonal side pockets.
Low-heeled slingbacks in imitation leather with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a back in ventilating mesh and reflective details. Stand-up collar with a zip at the top and short raglan sleeves with sections in ventilating mesh. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Small shoulder bag in supersoft imitation suede with fringing and glittery appliqués on the front, a zip at the top and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 13x16 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front, chest pocket and rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Lined triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Fully lined, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in lightweight, organic cotton denim. Straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, patch pockets and buttons at the sides. Unlined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in soft jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Tube scarf in soft faux fur. Width 25 cm, circumference 70 cm.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.

Long dress with a lace bodice and pleated chiffon skirt. Wrapover top that opens with concealed press-studs under the bust for easier nursing access. Cap sleeves with scalloped edges, and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining at the top and satin lining at the bottom.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Sandals in imitation suede with a braided jute trim around the soles, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1 cm. Heel 6 cm.
Mules with a high platform and two foot straps in scuba fabric, one with concealed elastication into the soles. Jersey linings and fluted soles. Height of soles 7.5 cm.

Short-sleeved playsuit in a crinkled weave with decorative embroidery. V-neck with a concealed press-stud, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking that wraps over at the front and extends over at the arms. Loose-fitting style that drapes lightly.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and a detachable fabric belt with a metal fastener.
Shirt in cotton denim with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back with a lace trim, and long sleeves.
Knee-length dress in a fluffy knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Crocheted top in a soft cotton blend with a stand-up collar and double-layered flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Cut-out section at the back with buttons at the bottom and back of the neck. Seam at the hem with a peplum.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Top in soft, lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck opening at the top and a vertical seam down the front.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Slightly shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Fitted tube top in soft cotton jersey.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, narrow frill trim around the elbows and covered elastication at the cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Dress in a cotton weave with short butterfly sleeves and a yoke with decorative gathers. Buttons at the back. Unlined.
Slightly longer jacket in a sturdy weave with shawl lapels, welt front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams and a single back vent. Lined.

Short sleeveless dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover front. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and sewn-in ties. Unlined.

prod_name: TP MAGNUS sweatpant w panel SB
detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt woven in a viscose blend with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Knee-length dress in patterned chiffon with a frill-trimmed V-neck and short wide sleeves. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist, tie belt and a pleated, lined skirt with a gentle flare.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and an adjustable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a deep V-neck and wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Romper suit in soft pile with a zip down the front, a hood with embroidery and ears, front pockets in the shape of paws, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar, button placket and rounded hem.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with a ribbed, frill-trimmed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative gathers at the shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-style cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with low dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves with a crocheted lace section.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with a slit and covered button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip at the back, and slits at the front. Unlined.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow and scalloped trim at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
Wide top in a stretchy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a straight hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, cold shoulder top in a patterned, crinkled weave with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a frill trim at the top.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Knee-length tunic in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow ties under the bust and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in a softly draping weave made from recycled polyester. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a small opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Lined at the front.
Lined, flounced bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastener at the back.

Sleeveless dress in patterned chiffon with decorative gathers around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover, flared skirt that is longer at the back. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, pleats at the top to create soft draping and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut blouse in satin crêpe with a boat neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with metal buttons.
Sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with pleats at the front of the neckline, an opening with a button at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has short sleeves and flares gently to the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Short, fitted dress in organic cotton jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Unlined.
Fitted blouse in soft imitation leather with a collar and press-studs down the front. Long puff sleeves, a discreet press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with print stripes, adjustable straps that cross at the back and tapered legs. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a visible zip in one side.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Cropped trousers in pleated jersey with a regular, elasticated waist and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Trousers in imitation leather. High waist with belt loops, a zip fly and press-studs and slim, ankle-length legs. Front pockets with a lining made from recycled polyester.
Knee socks in a soft jacquard knit.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, airy viscose twill with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.
